          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Attraction and repulsion in magnets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung und Abstossung in den Magneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction et répulsion dans des aimants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração e repulsion nos ímãs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione e repulsione in magneti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλξη και απέχθεια στους μαγνήτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción y repulsión en imanes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a magnet attracting steel pins. The brass hooks are not attracted by the magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brass hooks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steel pins</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Magneten, der 
Stahlstifte anzieht. Die Messinghaken werden nicht durch den 
Magneten angezogen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un aimant attirant les 
broches en acier. Les crochets en laiton ne sont pas attirés 
par l'aimant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um ímã que atrai os 
pinos de aço. Os ganchos de bronze não são atraídos pelo 
ímã.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un magnete che attrae
i perni d'acciaio. I ganci d'ottone non sono attratti dal 
magnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν μαγνήτη 
προσελκύοντας τις καρφίτσες χάλυβα. Οι γάντζοι ορείχαλκου 
δεν προσελκύονται από το μαγνήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un imán que atrae los 
contactos de acero. Los ganchos de cobre amarillo no son 
atraídos por el imán.</string>
          </description>
